017package org.apache.juneau.bean.jsonschema;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.StringUtils.*;
020import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ClassUtils.*;
021import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
022
023import java.net.*;
024import java.util.*;
025
026import org.apache.juneau.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.json.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.parser.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.serializer.*;
031import org.apache.juneau.swap.*;
032
033/**
034 * Represents a top-level schema object bean in the JSON-Schema core specification.
035 */
036@Bean(typeName="schema",
037   properties="id,$schema,$ref, title,description,type,definitions,properties,"
038      + "patternProperties,dependencies,items,multipleOf,maximum,exclusiveMaximum,"
039      + "minimum,exclusiveMinimum,maxLength,minLength,pattern,additionalItems,"
040      + "maxItems,minItems,uniqueItems,maxProperties,minProperties,required,"
041      + "additionalProperties,enum,allOf,anyOf,oneOf,not"
042)
043public class JsonSchema {
044   private String name;                                   // Property name.  Not serialized.
045   private URI id;
046   private URI schemaVersion;
047   private String title;
048   private String description;
049   private JsonType typeJsonType;                         // JsonType representation of type
050   private JsonTypeArray typeJsonTypeArray;               // JsonTypeArray representation of type
051   private Map<String,JsonSchema> definitions;
052   private Map<String,JsonSchema> properties;
053   private Map<String,JsonSchema> patternProperties;
054   private Map<String,JsonSchema> dependencies;
055   private JsonSchema itemsSchema;                            // JsonSchema representation of items
056   private JsonSchemaArray itemsSchemaArray;                  // JsonSchemaArray representation of items
057   private Number multipleOf;
058   private Number maximum;
059   private Boolean exclusiveMaximum;
060   private Number minimum;
061   private Boolean exclusiveMinimum;
062   private Integer maxLength;
063   private Integer minLength;
064   private String pattern;
065   private Boolean additionalItemsBoolean;                // Boolean representation of additionalItems
066   private JsonSchemaArray additionalItemsSchemaArray;        // JsonSchemaArray representation of additionalItems
067   private Integer maxItems;
068   private Integer minItems;
069   private Boolean uniqueItems;
070   private Integer maxProperties;
071   private Integer minProperties;
072   private List<String> required;
073   private Boolean additionalPropertiesBoolean;           // Boolean representation of additionalProperties
074   private JsonSchema additionalPropertiesSchema;             // JsonSchema representation of additionalProperties
075   private List<String> _enum;  // NOSONAR - Intentional naming.
076   private List<JsonSchema> allOf;
077   private List<JsonSchema> anyOf;
078   private List<JsonSchema> oneOf;
079   private JsonSchema not;
080   private URI ref;
081   private JsonSchemaMap schemaMap;
082   private JsonSchema master = this;
083
084   /**
085    * Default constructor.
086    */
087   public JsonSchema() { /* Empty constructor. */ }
088
089
090   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
091   // Bean properties
092   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
093
094   /**
095    * Bean property getter:  <property>name</property>.
096    *
097    * @return The value of the <property>name</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
098    */
099   public String getName() {
100      return name;
101   }
102
103   /**
104    * Bean property setter:  <property>name</property>.
105    *
106    * @param name The new value for the <property>name</property> property on this bean.
107    * @return This object.
108    */
109   public JsonSchema setName(String name) {
110      this.name = name;
111      return this;
112   }
113
114   /**
115    * Bean property getter:  <property>id</property>.
116    *
117    * @return The value of the <property>id</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
118    */
119   public URI getId() {
120      return id;
121   }
122
123   /**
124    * Bean property setter:  <property>id</property>.
125    *
126    * <p>
127    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
128    * Strings must be valid URIs.
129    *
130    * <p>
131    * URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
132    *
133    * @param id The new value for the <property>id</property> property on this bean.
134    * @return This object.
135    */
136   public JsonSchema setId(Object id) {
137      this.id = toURI(id);
138      return this;
139   }
140
141   /**
142    * Bean property getter:  <property>$schema</property>.
143    *
144    * @return The value of the <property>$schema</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
145    */
146   @Beanp("$schema")
147   public URI getSchemaVersionUri() {
148      return schemaVersion;
149   }
150
151   /**
152    * Bean property setter:  <property>$schema</property>.
153    *
154    * <p>
155    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
156    * Strings must be valid URIs.
157    *
158    * <p>
159    * URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
160    *
161    * @param schemaVersion The new value for the <property>schemaVersion</property> property on this bean.
162    * @return This object.
163    */
164   @Beanp("$schema")
165   public JsonSchema setSchemaVersionUri(Object schemaVersion) {
166      this.schemaVersion = toURI(schemaVersion);
167      return this;
168   }
169
170   /**
171    * Bean property getter:  <property>title</property>.
172    *
173    * @return The value of the <property>title</property> property, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
174    */
175   public String getTitle() {
176      return title;
177   }
178
179   /**
180    * Bean property setter:  <property>title</property>.
181    *
182    * @param title The new value for the <property>title</property> property on this bean.
183    * @return This object.
184    */
185   public JsonSchema setTitle(String title) {
186      this.title = title;
187      return this;
188   }
189
190   /**
191    * Bean property getter:  <property>description</property>.
192    *
193    * @return The value of the <property>description</property> property, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
194    */
195   public String getDescription() {
196      return description;
197   }
198
199   /**
200    * Bean property setter:  <property>description</property>.
201    *
202    * @param description The new value for the <property>description</property> property on this bean.
203    * @return This object.
204    */
205   public JsonSchema setDescription(String description) {
206      this.description = description;
207      return this;
208   }
209
210   /**
211    * Bean property getter:  <property>type</property>.
212    *
213    * @return
214    *    The value of the <property>type</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
215    *    Can be either a {@link JsonType} or {@link JsonTypeArray} depending on what value was used to set it.
216    */
217   @Swap(JsonTypeOrJsonTypeArraySwap.class)
218   public Object getType() {
219      if (typeJsonType != null)
220         return typeJsonType;
221      return typeJsonTypeArray;
222   }
223
224   /**
225    * Bean property getter:  <property>type</property>.
226    *
227    * <p>
228    * Convenience method for returning the <property>type</property> property when it is a {@link JsonType} value.
229    *
230    * @return
231    *    The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link JsonTypeArray}.
232    */
233   public JsonType getTypeAsJsonType() {
234      return typeJsonType;
235   }
236
237   /**
238    * Bean property getter:  <property>type</property>.
239    *
240    * <p>
241    * Convenience method for returning the <property>type</property> property when it is a {@link JsonTypeArray} value.
242    *
243    * @return The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link JsonType}.
244    */
245   public JsonTypeArray getTypeAsJsonTypeArray() {
246      return typeJsonTypeArray;
247   }
248
249   /**
250    * Bean property setter:  <property>type</property>.
251    *
252    * @param type
253    *    The new value for the <property>type</property> property on this bean.
254    *    This object must be of type {@link JsonType} or {@link JsonTypeArray}.
255    * @return This object.
256    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If invalid object type passed in.
257    */
258   public JsonSchema setType(Object type) {
259      this.typeJsonType = null;
260      this.typeJsonTypeArray = null;
261      if (type != null) {
262         if (type instanceof JsonType x)
263            this.typeJsonType = x;
264         else if (type instanceof JsonTypeArray x)
265            this.typeJsonTypeArray = x;
266         else
267            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchemaProperty.class, "Invalid attribute type ''{0}'' passed in.  Must be one of the following:  SimpleType, SimpleTypeArray", className(type));
268      }
269      return this;
270   }
271
272   /**
273    * Bean property appender:  <property>type</property>.
274    *
275    * @param types The list of items to append to the <property>type</property> property on this bean.
276    * @return This object.
277    */
278   public JsonSchema addTypes(JsonType...types) {
279      if (this.typeJsonTypeArray == null)
280         this.typeJsonTypeArray = new JsonTypeArray();
281      this.typeJsonTypeArray.addAll(types);
282      return this;
283   }
284
285   /**
286    * Used during parsing to convert the <property>type</property> property to the correct class type.
287    *
288    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
289    *    <li>
290    *       If parsing a JSON-array, converts to a {@link JsonTypeArray}.
291    *    <li>
292    *       If parsing a JSON-object, converts to a {@link JsonType}.
293    * </ul>
294    *
295    * <p>
296    * Serialization method is a no-op.
297    */
298   public static class JsonTypeOrJsonTypeArraySwap extends ObjectSwap<Object,Object> {
299
300      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
301      public Object swap(BeanSession session, Object o) throws SerializeException {
302         return o;
303      }
304
305      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
306      public Object unswap(BeanSession session, Object o, ClassMeta<?> hint) throws ParseException {
307         var cm = (
308            o instanceof Collection
309            ? session.getClassMeta(JsonTypeArray.class)
310            : session.getClassMeta(JsonType.class)
311         );
312         return session.convertToType(o, cm);
313      }
314   }
315
316   /**
317    * Bean property getter:  <property>definitions</property>.
318    *
319    * @return
320    *    The value of the <property>definitions</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
321    */
322   public Map<String,JsonSchema> getDefinitions() {
323      return definitions;
324   }
325
326   /**
327    * Bean property setter:  <property>definitions</property>.
328    *
329    * @param definitions The new value for the <property>definitions</property> property on this bean.
330    * @return This object.
331    */
332   public JsonSchema setDefinitions(Map<String,JsonSchema> definitions) {
333      this.definitions = definitions;
334      if (definitions != null)
335         setMasterOn(definitions.values());
336      return this;
337   }
338
339   /**
340    * Bean property appender:  <property>definitions</property>.
341    *
342    * @param name The key in the definitions map entry.
343    * @param definition The value in the definitions map entry.
344    * @return This object.
345    */
346   public JsonSchema addDefinition(String name, JsonSchema definition) {
347      if (this.definitions == null)
348         this.definitions = map();
349      this.definitions.put(name, definition);
350      setMasterOn(definition);
351      return this;
352   }
353
354   /**
355    * Bean property getter:  <property>properties</property>.
356    *
357    * @return The value of the <property>properties</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
358    */
359   public Map<String,JsonSchema> getProperties() {
360      return properties;
361   }
362
363   /**
364    * Returns the property with the specified name.
365    *
366    * <p>
367    * This is equivalent to calling <property>getProperty(name, <jk>false</jk>)</property>.
368    *
369    * @param name The property name.
370    * @return The property with the specified name, or <jk>null</jk> if no property is specified.
371    */
372   public JsonSchema getProperty(String name) {
373      return getProperty(name, false);
374   }
375
376   /**
377    * Returns the property with the specified name.
378    *
379    * <p>
380    * If <property>resolve</property> is <jk>true</jk>, the property object will automatically be  resolved by calling
381    * {@link #resolve()}.
382    * Therefore, <property>getProperty(name, <jk>true</jk>)</property> is equivalent to calling
383    * <property>getProperty(name).resolve()</property>, except it's safe from a potential
384    * <property>NullPointerException</property>.
385    *
386    * @param name The property name.
387    * @param resolve If <jk>true</jk>, calls {@link #resolve()} on object before returning.
388    * @return The property with the specified name, or <jk>null</jk> if no property is specified.
389    */
390   public JsonSchema getProperty(String name, boolean resolve) {
391      if (properties == null)
392         return null;
393      var s = properties.get(name);
394      if (s == null)
395         return null;
396      if (resolve)
397         s = s.resolve();
398      return s;
399   }
400
401   /**
402    * Bean property setter:  <property>properties</property>.
403    *
404    * @param properties The new value for the <property>properties</property> property on this bean.
405    * @return This object.
406    */
407   public JsonSchema setProperties(Map<String,JsonSchema> properties) {
408      this.properties = properties;
409      if (properties != null) {
410         properties.entrySet().forEach(x -> {
411            var value = x.getValue();
412            setMasterOn(value);
413            value.setName(x.getKey());
414         });
415      }
416      return this;
417   }
418
419   /**
420    * Bean property appender:  <property>properties</property>.
421    *
422    * <p>
423    * Properties must have their <property>name</property> property set on them when using this method.
424    *
425    * @param properties The list of items to append to the <property>properties</property> property on this bean.
426    * @return This object.
427    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If property is found without a set <property>name</property> property.
428    */
429   public JsonSchema addProperties(JsonSchema...properties) {
430      if (this.properties == null)
431         this.properties = map();
432      for (var p : properties) {
433         if (p.getName() == null)
434            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchema.class,
435               "Invalid property passed to JsonSchema.addProperties().  Property name was null.");
436         setMasterOn(p);
437         this.properties.put(p.getName(), p);
438      }
439      return this;
440   }
441
442   /**
443    * Bean property getter:  <property>patternProperties</property>.
444    *
445    * @return
446    *    The value of the <property>patternProperties</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is
447    *    not set.
448    */
449   public Map<String,JsonSchema> getPatternProperties() {
450      return patternProperties;
451   }
452
453   /**
454    * Bean property setter:  <property>patternProperties</property>.
455    *
456    * @param patternProperties The new value for the <property>patternProperties</property> property on this bean.
457    * @return This object.
458    */
459   public JsonSchema setPatternProperties(Map<String,JsonSchema> patternProperties) {
460      this.patternProperties = patternProperties;
461      if (patternProperties != null) {
462         patternProperties.entrySet().forEach(x -> {
463            var s = x.getValue();
464            setMasterOn(s);
465            s.setName(x.getKey());
466         });
467      }
468      return this;
469   }
470
471   /**
472    * Bean property appender:  <property>patternProperties</property>.
473    *
474    * <p>
475    * Properties must have their <property>name</property> property set to the pattern string when using this method.
476    *
477    * @param properties The list of items to append to the <property>patternProperties</property> property on this bean.
478    * @return This object.
479    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If property is found without a set <property>name</property> property.
480    */
481   public JsonSchema addPatternProperties(JsonSchemaProperty...properties) {
482      if (this.patternProperties == null)
483         this.patternProperties = map();
484      for (var p : properties) {
485         if (p.getName() == null)
486            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchema.class,
487               "Invalid property passed to JsonSchema.addProperties().  Property name was null.");
488         setMasterOn(p);
489         this.patternProperties.put(p.getName(), p);
490      }
491      return this;
492   }
493
494   /**
495    * Bean property getter:  <property>dependencies</property>.
496    *
497    * @return
498    *    The value of the <property>dependencies</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
499    */
500   public Map<String,JsonSchema> getDependencies() {
501      return dependencies;
502   }
503
504   /**
505    * Bean property setter:  <property>dependencies</property>.
506    *
507    * @param dependencies The new value for the <property>dependencies</property> property on this bean.
508    * @return This object.
509    */
510   public JsonSchema setDependencies(Map<String,JsonSchema> dependencies) {
511      this.dependencies = dependencies;
512      if (dependencies != null)
513         setMasterOn(dependencies.values());
514      return this;
515   }
516
517   /**
518    * Bean property appender:  <property>dependencies</property>.
519    *
520    * @param name The key of the entry in the dependencies map.
521    * @param dependency The value of the entry in the dependencies map.
522    * @return This object.
523    */
524   public JsonSchema addDependency(String name, JsonSchema dependency) {
525      if (this.dependencies == null)
526         this.dependencies = map();
527      this.dependencies.put(name, dependency);
528      setMasterOn(dependency);
529      return this;
530   }

532   /**
533    * Bean property getter:  <property>items</property>.
534    *
535    * @return
536    *    The value of the <property>items</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
537    *    Can be either a {@link JsonSchema} or {@link JsonSchemaArray} depending on what value was used to set it.
538    */
539   @Swap(JsonSchemaOrSchemaArraySwap.class)
540   public Object getItems() {
541      if (itemsSchema != null)
542         return itemsSchema;
543      return itemsSchemaArray;
544   }
545
546   /**
547    * Bean property getter:  <property>items</property>.
548    *
549    * <p>
550    * Convenience method for returning the <property>items</property> property when it is a {@link JsonSchema} value.
551    *
552    * @return The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link JsonSchemaArray}.
553    */
554   public JsonSchema getItemsAsSchema() {
555      return itemsSchema;
556   }
557
558   /**
559    * Bean property getter:  <property>items</property>.
560    *
561    * <p>
562    * Convenience method for returning the <property>items</property> property when it is a {@link JsonSchemaArray} value.
563    *
564    * @return The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link JsonSchema}.
565    */
566   public JsonSchemaArray getItemsAsSchemaArray() {
567      return itemsSchemaArray;
568   }
569
570   /**
571    * Used during parsing to convert the <property>items</property> property to the correct class type.
572    *
573    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
574    *    <li>
575    *       If parsing a JSON-array, converts to a {@link JsonSchemaArray}.
576    *    <li>
577    *       If parsing a JSON-object, converts to a {@link JsonSchema}.
578    * </ul>
579    *
580    * <p>
581    * Serialization method is a no-op.
582    */
583   public static class JsonSchemaOrSchemaArraySwap extends ObjectSwap<Object,Object> {
584
585      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
586      public Object swap(BeanSession session, Object o) throws SerializeException {
587         return o;
588      }
589
590      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
591      public Object unswap(BeanSession session, Object o, ClassMeta<?> hint) throws ParseException {
592         var cm = (
593            o instanceof Collection
594            ? session.getClassMeta(JsonSchemaArray.class)
595            : session.getClassMeta(JsonSchema.class)
596         );
597         return session.convertToType(o, cm);
598      }
599   }
600
601   /**
602    * Bean property setter:  <property>items</property>.
603    *
604    * @param
605    *    items The new value for the <property>items</property> property on this bean.
606    *    This object must be of type {@link JsonSchema} or {@link JsonSchemaArray}.
607    * @return This object.
608    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If invalid object type passed in.
609    */
610   public JsonSchema setItems(Object items) {
611      this.itemsSchema = null;
612      this.itemsSchemaArray = null;
613      if (items != null) {
614         if (items instanceof JsonSchema x) {
615            this.itemsSchema = x;
616            setMasterOn(this.itemsSchema);
617         } else if (items instanceof JsonSchemaArray x) {
618            this.itemsSchemaArray = x;
619            setMasterOn(this.itemsSchemaArray);
620         } else {
621            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchemaProperty.class, "Invalid attribute type ''{0}'' passed in.  Must be one of the following:  JsonSchema, JsonSchemaArray", className(items));
622         }
623      }
624      return this;
625   }
626
627   /**
628    * Bean property appender:  <property>items</property>.
629    *
630    * @param items The list of items to append to the <property>items</property> property on this bean.
631    * @return This object.
632    */
633   public JsonSchema addItems(JsonSchema...items) {
634      if (this.itemsSchemaArray == null)
635         this.itemsSchemaArray = new JsonSchemaArray();
636      this.itemsSchemaArray.addAll(items);
637      setMasterOn(items);
638      return this;
639   }
640

645    */
646   public Number getMultipleOf() {
647      return multipleOf;
648   }
649

656   public JsonSchema setMultipleOf(Number multipleOf) {
657      this.multipleOf = multipleOf;
658      return this;
659   }

667      return maximum;

723   /**

805   /**
806    * Bean property getter:  <property>additionalItems</property>.
807    *
808    * @return
809    *    The value of the <property>additionalItems</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is
810    *    not set.
811    *    Can be either a {@link Boolean} or {@link JsonSchemaArray} depending on what value was used to set it.
812    */
813   @Swap(BooleanOrSchemaArraySwap.class)
814   public Object getAdditionalItems() {
815      if (additionalItemsBoolean != null)
816         return additionalItemsBoolean;
817      return additionalItemsSchemaArray;
818   }
819
820   /**
821    * Bean property getter:  <property>additionalItems</property>.
822    *
823    * <p>
824    * Convenience method for returning the <property>additionalItems</property> property when it is a {@link Boolean}
825    * value.
826    *
827    * @return The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link JsonSchemaArray}.
828    */
829   public Boolean getAdditionalItemsAsBoolean() {
830      return additionalItemsBoolean;
831   }
832
833   /**
834    * Bean property getter:  <property>additionalItems</property>.
835    *
836    * <p>
837    * Convenience method for returning the <property>additionalItems</property> property when it is a
838    * {@link JsonSchemaArray} value.
839    *
840    * @return The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link Boolean}.
841    */
842   public List<JsonSchema> getAdditionalItemsAsSchemaArray() {
843      return additionalItemsSchemaArray;
844   }
845
846   /**
847    * Bean property setter:  <property>additionalItems</property>.
848    *
849    * @param additionalItems
850    *    The new value for the <property>additionalItems</property> property on this bean.
851    *    This object must be of type {@link Boolean} or {@link JsonSchemaArray}.
852    * @return This object.
853    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If invalid object type passed in.
854    */
855   public JsonSchema setAdditionalItems(Object additionalItems) {
856      this.additionalItemsBoolean = null;
857      this.additionalItemsSchemaArray = null;
858      if (additionalItems != null) {
859         if (additionalItems instanceof Boolean x)
860            this.additionalItemsBoolean = x;
861         else if (additionalItems instanceof JsonSchemaArray x) {
862            this.additionalItemsSchemaArray = x;
863            setMasterOn(this.additionalItemsSchemaArray);
864         } else {
865            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchemaProperty.class, "Invalid attribute type ''{0}'' passed in.  Must be one of the following:  Boolean, JsonSchemaArray", className(additionalItems));
866         }
867      }
868      return this;
869   }
870
871   /**
872    * Bean property appender:  <property>additionalItems</property>.
873    *
874    * @param additionalItems
875    *    The list of items to append to the <property>additionalItems</property> property on this bean.
876    * @return This object.
877    */
878   public JsonSchema addAdditionalItems(JsonSchema...additionalItems) {
879      if (this.additionalItemsSchemaArray == null)
880         this.additionalItemsSchemaArray = new JsonSchemaArray();
881      this.additionalItemsSchemaArray.addAll(additionalItems);
882      setMasterOn(additionalItems);
883      return this;
884   }
885
886   /**
887    * Used during parsing to convert the <property>additionalItems</property> property to the correct class type.
888    *
889    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
890    *    <li>
891    *       If parsing a JSON-array, converts to a {@link JsonSchemaArray}.
892    *    <li>
893    *       If parsing a JSON-boolean, converts to a {@link Boolean}.
894    * </ul>
895    *
896    * <p>
897    * Serialization method is a no-op.
898    */
899   public static class BooleanOrSchemaArraySwap extends ObjectSwap<Object,Object> {
900
901      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
902      public Object swap(BeanSession session, Object o) throws SerializeException {
903         return o;
904      }
905
906      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
907      public Object unswap(BeanSession session, Object o, ClassMeta<?> hint) throws ParseException {
908         var cm = (
909            o instanceof Collection
910            ? session.getClassMeta(JsonSchemaArray.class)
911            : session.getClassMeta(Boolean.class)
912         );
913         return session.convertToType(o, cm);
914      }
915   }

1040   /**
1041    * Bean property appender:  <property>required</property>.
1042    *
1043    * @param required The list of items to append to the <property>required</property> property on this bean.
1044    * @return This object.
1045    */
1046   public JsonSchema addRequired(List<String> required) {
1047      if (this.required == null)
1048         this.required = new LinkedList<>();
1049      required.forEach(x -> this.required.add(x));
1050      return this;
1051   }

1053   /**
1054    * Bean property appender:  <property>required</property>.
1055    *
1056    * @param required The list of items to append to the <property>required</property> property on this bean.
1057    * @return This object.
1058    */
1059   public JsonSchema addRequired(String...required) {
1060      if (this.required == null)
1061         this.required = new LinkedList<>();
1062      for (var r : required)
1063         this.required.add(r);
1064      return this;
1065   }

1067   /**
1068    * Bean property appender:  <property>required</property>.
1069    *
1070    * @param properties The list of items to append to the <property>required</property> property on this bean.
1071    * @return This object.
1072    */
1073   public JsonSchema addRequired(JsonSchemaProperty...properties) {
1074      if (this.required == null)
1075         this.required = new LinkedList<>();
1076      for (var p : properties)
1077         this.required.add(p.getName());
1078      return this;
1079   }

1123    * Bean property setter:  <property>additionalProperties</property>.
1124    *
1125    * @param additionalProperties
1126    *    The new value for the <property>additionalProperties</property> property on this bean.
1127    *    This object must be of type {@link Boolean} or {@link JsonSchema}.
1128    * @return This object.
1129    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If invalid object type passed in.
1130    */
1131   @Beanp(dictionary={JsonSchema.class})
1132   public JsonSchema setAdditionalProperties(Object additionalProperties) {
1133      this.additionalPropertiesBoolean = null;
1134      this.additionalPropertiesSchema = null;
1135      if (additionalProperties != null) {
1136         if (additionalProperties instanceof Boolean x)
1137            this.additionalPropertiesBoolean = x;
1138         else if (additionalProperties instanceof JsonSchema x) {
1139            this.additionalPropertiesSchema = x;
1140            setMasterOn(this.additionalPropertiesSchema);
1141         } else
1142            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchemaProperty.class,
1143               "Invalid attribute type ''{0}'' passed in.  Must be one of the following:  Boolean, JsonSchema",
1144               className(additionalProperties));
1145      }
1146      return this;
1147   }

1149   /**
1150    * Used during parsing to convert the <property>additionalProperties</property> property to the correct class type.
1151    *
1152    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
1153    *    <li>
1154    *       If parsing a JSON-object, converts to a {@link JsonSchema}.
1155    *    <li>
1156    *       If parsing a JSON-boolean, converts to a {@link Boolean}.
1157    * </ul>
1158    *
1159    * <p>
1160    * Serialization method is a no-op.
1161    */
1162   public static class BooleanOrSchemaSwap extends ObjectSwap<Object,Object> {
1163
1164      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
1165      public Object swap(BeanSession session, Object o) throws SerializeException {
1166         return o;
1167      }
1168
1169      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
1170      public Object unswap(BeanSession session, Object o, ClassMeta<?> hint) throws ParseException {
1171         var cm = (
1172            o instanceof Boolean
1173            ? session.getClassMeta(Boolean.class)
1174            : session.getClassMeta(JsonSchema.class)
1175         );
1176         return session.convertToType(o, cm);
1177      }
1178   }

1209      for (var e : _enum)

1243      this.allOf = addAll(this.allOf, allOf);
1244      return this;

1347      return ref;

1350   /**
1351    * Bean property setter:  <property>$ref</property>.
1352    *
1353    * <p>
1354    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
1355    * Strings must be valid URIs.
1356    *
1357    * <p>
1358    * URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
1359    *
1360    * @param ref The new value for the <property>$ref</property> property on this bean.
1361    * @return This object.
1362    */
1363   @Beanp("$ref")
1364   public JsonSchema setRef(Object ref) {
1365      this.ref = toURI(ref);
1366      return this;
1367   }
1368
1369   private void setMasterOn(JsonSchema s) {
1370      if (s != null)
1371         s.setMaster(this);
1372   }
1373
1374   private void setMasterOn(JsonSchema[] ss) {
1375      if (ss != null)
1376         for (var s : ss)
1377            setMasterOn(s);
1378   }
1379
1380   private void setMasterOn(Collection<JsonSchema> ss) {
1381      if (ss != null)
1382         ss.forEach(this::setMasterOn);
1383   }
1384
1385   private void setMasterOn(JsonSchemaArray ss) {
1386      if (ss != null)
1387         ss.forEach(this::setMasterOn);
1388   }
1389
1390   /**
1391    * Sets the master schema for this schema and all child schema objects.
1392    *
1393    * <p>
1394    * All child elements in a schema should point to a single "master" schema in order to locate registered JsonSchemaMap
1395    * objects for resolving external schemas.
1396    *
1397    * @param master The master schema to associate on this and all children.  Can be <jk>null</jk>.
1398    */
1399   protected void setMaster(JsonSchema master) {
1400      this.master = master;
1401      if (definitions != null)
1402         definitions.values().forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1403      if (properties != null)
1404         properties.values().forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1405      if (patternProperties != null)
1406         patternProperties.values().forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1407      if (dependencies != null)
1408         dependencies.values().forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1409      if (itemsSchema != null)
1410         itemsSchema.setMaster(master);
1411      if (itemsSchemaArray != null)
1412         itemsSchemaArray.forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1413      if (additionalItemsSchemaArray != null)
1414         additionalItemsSchemaArray.forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1415      if (additionalPropertiesSchema != null)
1416         additionalPropertiesSchema.setMaster(master);
1417      if (allOf != null)
1418         allOf.forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1419      if (anyOf != null)
1420         anyOf.forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1421      if (oneOf != null)
1422         oneOf.forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1423      if (not != null)
1424         not.setMaster(master);
1425   }
1426
1427   /**
1428    * Resolve schema if reference.
1429    *
1430    * <p>
1431    * If this schema is a reference to another schema (has its <property>$ref</property> property set), this
1432    * method will retrieve the referenced schema from the schema map registered with this schema.
1433    *
1434    * <p>
1435    * If this schema is not a reference, or no schema map is registered with this schema, this method is a no-op and
1436    * simply returns this object.
1437    *
1438    * @return The referenced schema, or <jk>null</jk>.
1439    */
1440   public JsonSchema resolve() {
1441      if (ref == null || master.schemaMap == null)
1442         return this;
1443      return master.schemaMap.get(ref);
1444   }
1445
1446   /**
1447    * Associates a schema map with this schema for resolving other schemas identified through <property>$ref</property>
1448    * properties.
1449    *
1450    * @param schemaMap The schema map to associate with this schema.  Can be <jk>null</jk>.
1451    * @return This object.
1452    */
1453   public JsonSchema setSchemaMap(JsonSchemaMap schemaMap) {
1454      this.schemaMap = schemaMap;
1455      return this;
1456   }
1457
1458   @Override /* Object */
1459   public String toString() {
1460      return JsonSerializer.DEFAULT.toString(this);
1461   }
1462}
